messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 2356
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 9/10/2002 8:53:25 AM Pacific Daylight Time, ... You can predict funny little things, too, and then the older kid will think it is FUN when
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 9/10/2002 8:53:25 AM Pacific Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:


> When my kids were first ever going to be around younger kids I would remind
> them what that kid could or couldn't or might like to do, what would be too
>
> much, what would be dangerous

You can predict funny little things, too, and then the older kid will think
it is FUN when they come true. For example, you can PREDICT that the 2 yo
will say "NO!!!!" many times, often even when they mean "yes."

--pam
Not speaking officially for:
The National Home Education Network
http://www.NHEN.org
Changing the Way the World Sees Homeschooling!


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
